bioconda.name: ibdseq
bioconda.summary: IBDseq is a software program for detecting segments of identity-by-descent (IBD) and homozygosity-by-descent (HBD) in unphased genetic sequence data.

biocontainers.name: ibdseq
biocontainers.summary: Ibdseq is a software program for detecting segments of identity-by-descent (ibd) and homozygosity-by-descent (hbd) in unphased genetic sequence data.

biotools.summary: Software program for detecting segments of identity-by-descent (IBD) and homozygosity-by-descent (HBD) in unphased genetic sequence data. IBDseq can analyze large data sets with thousands of individuals, and it can analyze data with multi-allelic markers.

bioschemas.name: IBDseq
bioschemas.summary: Software program for detecting segments of identity-by-descent (IBD) and homozygosity-by-descent (HBD) in unphased genetic sequence data. IBDseq can analyze large data sets with thousands of individuals, and it can analyze data with multi-allelic markers.
